prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a shiny blue shell and a pink pearl on its head.
I want to design a cute aquatic Pokemon that has a round body and soft features.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a clam with a vibrant color scheme and unique patterns.
Make a small, adorable Pokemon that lives in the sea and has a playful personality.
Imagine a Pokemon that can camouflage itself in its environment, perfect for ocean habitats.
Show me a clam-like Pokemon with a whimsical design and bright colors that draw attention.
Give me a concept for a dual-type Pokemon that combines water and fairy elements.
